pagination.rowsPerPage: Motango ya milɔngɔ́ na lokasa moko .

kick.title: Confirmer membre ya kicking .
kick.content: Ozali na ntembe te ete olingi kobengana mosangani yango na shambre?

ban.title: Confirmer ba membres oyo epekisami .
ban.content: Ozali na kondima ete olingi kopekisa mosangani oyo? Mosangani akozala na makoki te ya kosangana lisusu na shambre nsima ya epekiseli.

toast.loadError: Elongi te ko charger liste ya ba membres .

kick.success: Ba membres babengani bango na chambre .

ban.error: Elongi te ko bloquer ba membres .

invite.title: Benga ba membres ba sangana na chambre .
invite.inputLabel: Svp kotisa ID ya mosaleli ya Matrix (lokola @user:matrix.org)
invite.error: Libyangi elongi te, tosengi otala ID ya mosaleli to ndingisa .
